Sentencas: A systematic approach was taken to investigate the morphology of NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) films deposited by a spray coating process.
Titulo: Correlation between yttria stabilized zirconia particle size and morphological properties of NiO-YSZ films prepared by spray coating process

Sentencas: The final morphological aspects of anode films were influenced by the particle size of YSZ powders and the milling time of the slurries used for film deposition.
Titulo: Correlation between yttria stabilized zirconia particle size and morphological properties of NiO-YSZ films prepared by spray coating process

Sentencas: YSZ powders with average particle size of 17 and 52 nm were obtained from powders calcined at 800 and 1000 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Correlation between yttria stabilized zirconia particle size and morphological properties of NiO-YSZ films prepared by spray coating process

Sentencas: The results obtained by rheological studies pointed out that slurries prepared from YSZ powders calcinated at 1000 degrees C and milling time of 20 h had more stability.
Titulo: Correlation between yttria stabilized zirconia particle size and morphological properties of NiO-YSZ films prepared by spray coating process

Sentencas: All slurries presented thixotropic and pseudoplastic behaviors.
Titulo: Correlation between yttria stabilized zirconia particle size and morphological properties of NiO-YSZ films prepared by spray coating process

Sentencas: (c) 2009 Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
